DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate formal curriculum teach basic procedure pediatric intern Children 's Hospital , Boston . The incoming class intern academic year '05-06 randomly assign participate curriculum . Four procedure include intravenous catheter insertion , venipuncture ( blood draw ) , bag-and-mask ventilation , lumbar puncture ( spinal tap ) taught . Interns test ability perform skill anatomic model live patient . Our hypothesis intern receive formal curriculum confident successful performing procedure .
DOC.criteria: Pediatric Intern Boston Combined Residency Program AY '05'06
